page.title: 13THE WORK OUR PARENTS DO.
page.content: {Our investigations show that,of the {thirteen families represented in the {school,all fathers are presently in {employment and 6 mothers have jobs,in {addition to being housewives. Of the fathers, 2 are employed in Pilkington's Glass factory (St.Asaph). 2 are employed on the land, one as a local farmer the other a farmworker at Bodfari. 1 is employed at Courtauld's Greenfield works (Soon to close).1 is a Meat Inspector,working at the local abbatoir and at Rhyl. Another is a milkman based locally. 1 is a taxi driver based in Prestatyn. Another is an International haulier who is self- employed. 2 others, in conjunction with their wives are, respectively,the Licensee of the Public House and the owner of the local Post Office/Shop/ Cafe. 1 father is a market-stallholder at Mostyn and Denbigh.
